body:
Er, I close the fd, then logger say "I got an error", it's not an error especially for system admin(not the developer). I MUST ignore the error especially for the connection-oriented service, because there are lots of connections which maybe closed locally, and I don't want to log lots of error(seems system error for admin but it actually just ok).

When we close the fd locally, should we care about what happend? I think we can ignore any error because we cut it.
